backend/BatsmanPerformance.mo: Defines a BatsmanPerformance record type with fields for runs, balls faced, boundaries, and innings.
backend/BowlerPerformance.mo: Defines a BowlerPerformance record type including overs, maidens, runs conceded, wickets, and balls bowled.
backend/FielderPerformance.mo: Defines a FielderPerformance record type with catches, stumpings, and dismissals.
backend/main.mo: Main backend actor defining player, team, match, scorecard, auction, and user-related types with authorization mixin included.
feature_evidence.json: JSON report listing implemented features, related files, components, test IDs, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing major frontend files, components, hooks, and styling.
frontend/.ic-assets.json5: Asset configuration specifying caching rules and content-type headers for deployed frontend files.
frontend/DEPLOYMENT.md: Deployment guide placeholder outlining production build and troubleshooting steps.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind-based global styles defining OKLCH color variables for light and dark themes.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry file including boot error fallback UI and early error-capture script before React mounts.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React application configuring routes, error handling, profile setup logic, and global providers.
frontend/src/components/AdminHeader.tsx: Header component showing admin info and handling login/logout via Internet Identity.
frontend/src/components/AuctionSummary.t: Displays auction stats and team summaries with CSV export and error/loading states.
frontend/src/components/BallByBallEditor: Editor for entering and updating ball‑by‑ball match data with validation and mutation support.
frontend/src/components/CrashFallbackScr: Full‑page crash screen with error details, refresh options, and debugging navigation.
frontend/src/components/FatalErrorProvid: Context provider that captures fatal errors and renders the crash fallback screen.
frontend/src/components/GlobalErrorBound: React error boundary that logs errors and shows the crash fallback UI on failures.
frontend/src/components/LeadingTeamIndic: UI badge indicating the currently leading team with crown icon styling.
frontend/src/components/MatchInningsScor: Authenticated editor for entering and updating batsman and bowler performance by innings.
UI for creating, editing, publishing, and managing matches with team selection and score inputs.
frontend/src/components/PlayerAuctionDia: Dialog to run and control live player auctions, including starting auctions and placing bids.
frontend/src/components/PlayerManagement: Admin interface for creating, editing, assigning, deleting players, and launching auctions.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: Modal allowing a user to enter and save their profile name.
frontend/src/components/PublicBallByBall: Displays grouped ball‑by‑ball data by innings and over with highlights for the latest ball.
frontend/src/components/PublicInningsCon: Shows current innings context such as players, overs, and last‑ball details.
frontend/src/components/TeamBoughtPlayer: Lists players purchased by a team or shows loading/error states.
frontend/src/components/TeamHeader.tsx: Displays team name, purse, and authentication controls, handling login/logout via Internet Identity and navigation.
frontend/src/components/TeamManagement.t: Provides UI for creating teams, editing team names and purses, and accessing owner/player management sections.
frontend/src/components/TeamMatches.tsx: Fetches and displays matches, optionally filtered by team, showing results, scores, and match details.
frontend/src/components/TeamOwnersManage: Manages team owners, allowing adding/removing principals and editing stored owner display names.
frontend/src/components/TournamentFixtur: Generates and previews round-robin fixtures for teams, with validation and fixture submission to backend.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches a backend actor tied to the current identity, reinitializing and invalidating queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and provider for authenticating with Internet Identity, managing identity state, and exposing login-related status flags.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for interacting with backend actor methods, covering user profiles, players, teams, and related mutations.
frontend/src/index.css: Configures Tailwind CSS base layers and theme variables for both light and dark modes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/pages/AdminDashboardPage.ts: Admin dashboard rendering tabs for managing players, teams, matches, auctions, and tournaments, with identity and profile-based loading states.
frontend/src/pages/DebugPage.tsx: Diagnostics page showing backend actor status, user role query results, and runtime debug info.
frontend/src/pages/LoginPage.tsx: Login page handling Internet Identity authentication and redirecting users based on their profile role.
frontend/src/pages/NotFoundPage.tsx: Renders a styled 404 page with navigation buttons to home, admin, and team views.
frontend/src/pages/PublicScorecardPage.t: Fetches and displays a public cricket scorecard with sharing, player lookup, loading, and error states.
frontend/src/pages/TeamDashboardPage.tsx: Shows a team dashboard with player roster, purse info, and optional team selector based on user profile.
frontend/src/utils/ballByBall.ts: Provides utilities to derive innings context, group balls by over, and identify the latest ball from ball‑by‑ball data.
frontend/src/utils/csvExport.ts: Generates and downloads a CSV file summarizing team auction data.
frontend/src/utils/globalErrorHandling.t: Sets up global handlers for errors and unhandled rejections, capturing context and invoking an optional callback.
frontend/src/utils/roundRobin.ts: Generates round‑robin fixtures by creating unique team pairings with sequential round numbers.
frontend/src/utils/runtimeDebugInfo.ts: Collects and logs runtime environment and location details for debugging.
frontend/src/utils/shareLinks.ts: Provides utilities for building public share URLs, copying to clipboard, and using the Web Share API.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utilities for reading URL and hash parameters plus storing, retrieving, and clearing persisted values in sessionStorage.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration defining theme extensions, colors, animations, and plugins for the frontend.
project_state.json: JSON metadata describing project state, known issues, and feature requirements for fixing site load failures and adding diagnostics.
